value.name: Darwen woman jailed for eight years after ‘relentlessly’ abusing partner
value.description: Wendy Chappell, senior prosecutor for the Crown ... therefore, the CPS and police take all cases of domestic violence extremely seriously regardless of whether the victim is male or female.

value.name: Driver overtook hearse on a pelican crossing
value.description: Wendy Chappell, prosecuting, said the incident in Preston Old Road was witnessed by an off-duty police officer who saw the van driven by Partington overtake the hearse and a second car.

value.name: Father Higginbottom, former priest of Darlington St Augustine's, is jailed
value.description: He told police that St Joseph's was a "cold ... It is unique in my experience to see it to this extent." Wendy Chappell for the CPS said: “Michael Higginbottom carried out a series of violent ...
